name: The Silveriver family
description:
Today marks a decade since my family and I set out to stop curses that could be hurting any kind of being. People, spirits, animals, we help everyone as long as it is within our capabilities. So, as usual, this date means I get to start a new journal, my 11th one.
CURSE NUMBER... 68

Join the Silveriver family as they follow a lead to the city of Niburofa, which is being afflicted by a terrible curse. They will try to lift the curse, while one of them is suffering its effects.

Notes:

  • 6.5k words.
  • 2 endings.
  • 6 Backgrounds

WARNINGS:  

  • Strong themes.
  • Blood.
  • While directly not shown, death is openly discussed.
